title: Catskill Art Space Opens With James Turrell and a Lofty Vision
description: A cultural destination is born in New York’s Sullivan County, featuring world-class art alongside regional talents.
dc:creator: Laura van Straaten
media:credit: James Turrell; Photo by Noah Kalina
media:description: James Turrell’s “Avaar” at the Catskill Art Space in Livingston Manor, N.Y., is achromatic — using only white light.
